title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions:
### GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto

#### Product Overview
The GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto is designed to provide professional salon-quality results at home. This sleek and stylish dryer features a modern rose gold finish with the option to complement your decor with its silver or black variants.

#### Key Features

**Performance:**
- **Drying Speed:** 30% faster than other dryers, ensuring your hair is ready faster.
- **Motor Power:** 1700W brushless motor, delivering powerful airflow.
- **Motor Speed:** 7 times faster than traditional hair dryers, for efficient and quick drying.
- **Professional Results:** Achieve salon-level styling with every use.

**Design:**
- **Color Options:** Silver, Black, or Rose Gold (standard)
- **Ergonomic Design:** Perfectly shaped for comfortable use, reducing strain on your hands.
- **Oxy Active Technology:** Enhances the drying process and helps preserve your hairâ€™s natural shine and health.

**Attachments:**
- **Diffuser:** Included to help distribute the airflow evenly and prevent flyaways.
- **Concentrator Nozzles:** 2 included for precise styling control.

**Additional Features:**
- **Innovative Microfilter:** Prevents tiny dirt particles from entering the dryer, maintaining hygiene.
- **Auto-Clean Technology:** Ensures the dryer is maintained and clean, prolonging its lifespan.
- **LED Memory Configuration:** Offers 18 different settings, with an LED display for easy access and an auto-diagnosis feature to keep you informed.

#### Specifications
- **Weight:** Under 1LB (0.9 kg)
- **Drying Speed:** 30% faster than other dryers
- **Motor Wattage:** 1700W
- **Motor Speed:** 7 times faster than traditional hair dryers
- **Air Flow Design:** Multiplies air flow for efficient drying
- **Ergonomics:** Sleek and ergonomic, with Oxy Active Technology

#### Ideal For
- Salon professionals looking for a high-quality dryer at home
- Stylists needing a reliable tool for salon applications
- At-home users seeking professional results without leaving the comfort of their home

The GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto is the perfect choice for anyone who values quality, efficiency, and comfort in their hair styling routine. Upgrade your hair care experience today!
